linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Quad Core 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: M1 Octa Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 11, Windows 10, Windows 8 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
